alert.note: Alert for Bowman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:47PM CDT until July 31 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOWMAN AND SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 847 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Scranton, or 17 miles southeast of Bowman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Reeder around 900 PM MDT. Hettinger around 930 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bowman Haley Dam, Bucyrus and Gascoyne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
